short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Privacy Bookmarks is designed to help users manage their bookmarks with a focus on privacy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Privacy Bookmarks is designed to help users manage their bookmarks with a focus on privacy. With Privacy Bookmarks, you can save and organize links to your favorite websites, articles, videos, and more, all while ensuring that your data remains private and secure.

* Privacy-Focused:
You can save and organize your favorites  in your own account. Bookmarks can only be viewed once you have logged in.

* Local Storage:
Store bookmarks locally on their device instead of syncing them to a cloud service, providing additional privacy.

* Private Browsing:
You can open bookmarks in an incognito window, and no browsing history is left.

* No Tracking:
Privacy Bookmarks doesn't track your activity or collect your data for advertising purposes.
